name: RaifaRPG: The Legend Of The Golden Sword
name_original: RaifaRPG: The Legend Of The Golden Sword
description:
A text-based adventure game that runs entirely in a terminal. You play as a traveler who wakes up in the forest with no memories and few resources in his backpack. You have no goal or at least no idea where to go. You can travel, fight, trade and craft.

The game is now very small and simple, but it will grow. plz report all the bugs that you find, this will greatly help the game and my motivation (I have been making this game for 2 months already, and I published it only a few days ago)

Task list

  • Story
  • Dialogues 
  • Quests

                Monsters will drop quest items

  • Base

                Building system

  • Medicine and health system
  • Town Generation
  • Save game function
  • Character editor
  • Mac OS X  and linux support
  • Multiplayer
